fullText: Escola, who New Yorkers will know from Joe’s Pub gigs and TV viewers might recognize from “Search Party,” is conjuring theatrical magic at the Lyceum that must be seen to be believed. And, as the show is so bizarre as to defy description, to be fully grasped. “Oh, Mary!” might not be another theatrical history lesson Broadway is used to, but I reckon it’s a show for the history books.
